answerText: Gram stain[10]  Name either of the two common counterstains used in Gram staining. They provide an excellent contrast to the primary stain, crystal violet.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 4 | 5 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Acid-fast organisms are among those that can't be easily characterized using this technique. [10] Name this stain that differentiates bacteria into two groups based on whether or not they have lots of peptidoglycan in their cell walls. Streptococcus is [this technique]-positive.
